Job.Title: Crystal Purifier
Job.Description: She will clean up the filmed scenes. One Purifier can process at most 3 scenes per week.

LoseTrait.Text: It took her ruining many video crystals, and just as many reprimands, but ${name} has finally stopped being so Clumsy.

Message.Name: no-crew
Message.Text: There was no crew to film the scene, so ${name} took the day off.

Message.Name: no-actress
Message.Text: There were no actresses to film, so ${name} took the day off.

Message.Name: refuse
Message.Text: ${name} refused to work as a crystal purifier today.

Message.Name: work
Message.Text: ${name} was assigned to work as a Crystal Purifier.

Message.Name: work.perfect
Message.Text: Her skill with movie crystals, together with her deep understanding of colour and contrast allowed her to transform the scene into a masterpiece. Truly an outstanding work in post-production.

Message.Name: work.great
Message.Text: She preserves the recordings with great skill, and is able to perform some touch-ups that make the scenes look even better.

Message.Name: work.good
Message.Text: She knows how to preserve the recording, and has the skill to edit them further in post-production. What ${name} is lacking is the experience on where to edit and how to touch up things in a more subtle way.

Message.Name: work.ok
Message.Text: She managed to preserve the recording more or less in the same state as the original film.

Message.Name: work.bad
Message.Text: She managed to preserve the recordings in a storage crystal, though the image is somewhat distorted in places.

Message.Name: work.worst
Message.Text: Seeing the cracked movie crystal, you decide that ${name} probably should never again be left unsupervised with the footage. It is a wonder that there is still something left of the scene.
